favourite.article: God created us to be the same as He is in life and in nature. He placed love in our hearts because He Himself is love. That is why I can't help but to love so many things. It is only through this can He deal with each one of us, showing us that His love prevails all things and reaches far beyond our understanding, yet gentle enough to embrace us when we turn back to Him. Lord, how I love You. I'm so happy to be in this sweet love story with you and all the brothers and sisters, living, inseparable, as one couple, eternally.
Praise the Lord!

For only God's love can! Even though so many times I have not turned to the Lord, He still loves me! He fell in love with man and I have fell in love with Him! This song touched me deeply and many other young people at a young people's conference. It is such a sweet song, both exposing my weak natural man and revealing God's unending and unchanging love. Lord, thank You for Your love! How I love You! You are so lovely! I just love You!
RG, you must not know the Bible. Several books of the Bible compare the relationship between Christ and the church as a Divine Romance. See Ephesians 5:25, Revelation 22:17 for starters.
Oh Lord Jesus! What a great mystery, God and man, to become one, as inseparable couple, to dwell eternally. Praise Him.
Oh saints Jesus's blood has redeemed me. And thier is a great mystery of God which is Jesus Christ.
Oh, Lord, Amen! Hallelujah!
I love this song so much, 'His love is so tender, to Him I'll surrender', O Lord Jesus, I love You because You love me first.
What a touching hymn. Let us all be His bride!

What a Beautiful, beautiful song! God fell in love with man! To make man just the same as He! I'll consecrate my whole being to my Beloved Lord! He is so precious and so charming! I will love Him, and love Him and love Him!

This is a nice song, and much of it is truth. Some of it, however, borders on blasphemy. Jesus' love for us, though compared to a romantic love so humans can understand its depth, is not sensual, and it isn't appropriate to cast it in that kind of light. I will take artistic license in changing some of the words when I teach this song so it will be reverent rather than sappy.
I gladly call JESUS!!
Beautiful! What a wonderful God-man Savior.
Living inseparable as one couple eternally!!

Praise the Lord!!! We thank the Lord for His wonderful love!!! We love the Lord!!! Thank You, dear Lord! Praise Your name! I love You Lord Jesus! I am crazy about You! You are precious! I love You (kiss)! Oh! Lord, You are beautiful!

Praise the Lord, for revealing the mystery to us that God desires to wrought Himself to us for us to be His expression and enlargement; amen for eternally we will be one with Him and live as ONE COUPLE. Amen!
Beautiful hymn. So Cool.
I am stirred up inside out. S inspiring. Christ is irresistibly lovely.
How great this is, so I will love it forever.
Hallelujah! We inseparable from His love. Lord Jesus!
Saints who are we that the great mystery, which had been hidden for ages has now been revealed to us! we are those who have been regenerated, redeemed, forgiven, those who will hold back no longer!

What a price our Lord had to pay for us. He did not give up on us because of His love. He did not concider the high price he had to pay to win us back to Him, to restore us back to Him. Oh Lord Jesus! Lord we love You! Lord Your love has melted my heart!
I like this song because it is the moment when God loves us even if we have sinned a lot but it is nice to hear that because of Jesus' blood our sins are cleansed.

I love this song a lot. My sister got married not to long ago me and some other sisters sang this song for my sisters wedding in front of lots of people. This song always encourages me when I am sad. It makes me smile!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Though He was rejected by men who were blinded, His heart still unchanging.Thank You, Lord Jesus that You came to seek us.
Amen! Amen! Amen! How God has a great mystery to us! :)
Lord Jesus I just love You. I want You to make home in my heart and gain me wholly!

A translated Chinese version:
一个神圣、罗曼蒂克的故事
1. 一个伟大奥秘， 一则奇妙故事； 历世历代隐藏， 启示于祂智慧； 这（是）神圣罗曼史， 神人各按其时； 超乎所思所想， 显现于（亲见于）真神言语。
真神深爱世人—— 惟有真神的爱， 使人有祂样式， （共）同生命（共）同性情。 我们是祂表彰， 祂新妇、祂扩展；、 永远形影不离（成双成对）， 如夫妻合而为一， 永不分离。
2. 纵使遭人弃绝， 瞎眼人拒绝祂； 祂爱宽容忍耐， 祂心坚定不变； 于是道成肉身， 降世成为拯救（降世为拯救人）； 祂取名为“耶稣”， 祂屈尊寻求我们。
3. 纵然诞生为罪身， 祂宝血救赎我。 在各各他（受苦）受难， 在荣耀中被提（提升）。 为着使我重生， 如今结合成一灵， 我爱慕享受祂， 因我罪得赦免！
4. 祂爱如此温柔， 我要向祂降服； 祂名如此宝贵， 我欢喜叫：“耶稣！” 祂品格何等迷人， 不住（永远）夺取我心， 我不再保留自己， 我要永远爱祂。

We thank Him, love Him, serve Him, worship Him, praise Him and glorify Him forever!
"His divine power has granted to us all things that pertain to life and godliness, through the knowledge of Him who called us to His own glory and excellence, by which He has granted to us His precious and very great promises, so that through them you may become partakers of the divine nature, having escaped from the corruption that is in the world because of sinful desire." 2 Peter 1:3-4
I'm truly blessed with this song. Thanks to God for His love.

Oh what a joy of God's grace! I really appreciate all the Lord's songs for it helps me to remember God particularly this song by His love! Lord Jesus, cause me, O Lord to love You alone. I Love Thee Lord Jesus!
aduhaii lagu ni apik bangeeet. Thanks, God love You so much.
Wow! I'm so glad I found this site and especially this hymn, it simply wonderful.
I love this song because I realized the real plan of God. I love God because He loves us.
I really love this song, that's why I want to hear it again and again. ^^ The more I listen to this song, the more I love the Lord. It always reminded me, how the Lord loves us. Amen.
I love this hymn, A divine, romantic story!! The more I listen to it, the more I fall in love with God. Oh, Lord, how I love you, Lord!
Amen. What a divine romance to always stay and have Christ as our life.

This is a song that tells the story well, yet with the life uplifting needed for those who get involved in rituals of worship and forget the simple truth of salvation through the sacarifice granted us by our loving God. The music is great for many uses. Piano is one of my personal favorites.

Hino maravilhoso!! muito desfrutável!!! Jesus é o Senhor!!!
Para sempre juntos com o nosso Senhor como um casal inseparável!! =DDD
This song is very touching. It always reminds me of how much He loved me, that He even came and die on the cross to save me. Hallelujah for His great love!!!!

Praise the Lord! I really am touched by this song. Though we are sinners but hallelujah for God's mysterious love that can only make us the same as He is in life and in nature that we may become His enlargement, His bride and living as one couple eternally. Amen.
Praise GOD for revealing to us this great mystery which was hidden from ages. I really really love this song.....

We confess that the third of the Trinity, the Spirit, is equally God. All that the Father has and is, is expressed by the Son, and all that the Son has and is, is realized as the Spirit....thank You Lord for this hymn really touches us with Your great love. Amen.
The lyrics of this song is very intimate.
Praise the Lord! God's love is for us. That's why I love this song.
I really love the hymn. We are the bride of Christ. He fell in love with us sinners. Hallelujah, saints!

I very love this song. Every time I hear this song, praise the Lord for HIs great Love and mercy. He reminded us how He love us, the church. I will love Him forever. He regenerated me now joined in one spirit. I love to enjoy Him, for I've been forgiven. Amen.

I love this song. Every time I hear this song, I am reminded how the Lord loves me and you even before we were born. The Lord loves us to the uttermost. May we learn to love Him also with our best and absolute love. This is the greatest romantic love story in the whole universe!
Praise the Lord! God's love is so tender, to Him we should surrender. Hallelujah!
Praise the Lord for HIS great LOVE and Mercy! We remain in the church...

Amen. God fell in love with man, redeemed man, and am now making us His expression. All we need to do is love Him, our Bridegroom forever and He will make us His counterpart. Praise God for this wonderful deep hymn.
Que maravilla que Dios se haya enamorado y hoy esté conquistando consigo mismo ha su amada novia. Oh Señor Jesús nos volvemos a Ti para corresponder a este dulce y tierno amor.
Praise the Lord, wherever I am, Philippines or UK, I'm still home in the local church. I got the right One, the all inclusive One - CHRIST.
Forever together, as living inseparably as one couple - eternally. Hallelujah!
Praise the Lord! He is so wonderful!
Praise the Lord! There is one Body in the universe and we are a part of it!
I really love this hymn! What a wonderful hymn that captures our heart us to love the Lord more.
Let's keep on loving Him. He will never leave us nor forsake us. Hallelujah!
Amen!!!! God fell in love with man, for only God's love can! Make man just the same as He!

I really love this song for it always reminds me of God's great love for us. How could I repay such unconditional and unlimited love that chooses no one whatever be your condition before Him. I just need to eat Him and digest Him everyday. Hallelujah for this Wonderful Person living in us. Let us together eat Christ.
God fell in love with man, this is such a wonderful story on this earth. Nothing can compare with God's love, He is so wonderful.
Praise the Lord! Such a wonderful song. Very refreshing. Our God is so great and mysterious.
We can praise our precious Triune God because He is all for us. Oh, Lord Jesus, Amen.

His love is so tender, to Him I'll surrender.
Lord Jesus I love You!
Oh Lord Jesus! Oh Lord Jesus! We just love You.
It's such a moving touching song full of the wonder of Jesus.

ME GUSTA PORQUE ESTA ESTE CANTICO ME ANIMA YA QUE ES LA PRIMERA VES QUE VI A MIS HERMANOS DE DIFERENTES PAISES Y ME GUSTA MUCHO MAS PORQUE ES UN REGALO DE MI HERMANA VINA QUE ES DE TAIWAN Y LA CONOCI A QUI EN HUANUCO SOMOS UNO SEOR JESUS.

Amen! This song is one of my favorites. It makes us know how God loves us. Since long before the world began, God already loves us. Even after man's great fall, God stll loves man wholly and completely.
After man commited sin, man is no longer worthy to be love, but hallelujah for such a great love of our God.
As King of kings, Lord of lords, He chose to became a man just to be mingled with man. Man has always been the object of God's heart's desire. Hallelujah for the love of God that continues to constrain us. He is the only worthy One for our love.
Eu gosto muito deste site por que ele traz muito desfrute da pessoa de Cristo Jesus!Me leva a ir para o Esprito

WOW! What a song! so precious, so dear and near to our hearts. If man can see this, how the universe would be transformed! But the Lord has His people who knows Him, follow Him and especially knows His voice. Lord captivate our hearts and sanctify us. LORD JESUS WE LOVE YOU! Only Your love can transform us Lord to please Your very heart! LORD Jesus!
I love this song because it's a reminder to me that I am married to Jesus and He loves me very much and I love Him too and truly want to serve Him wholeheartedly.

O Lord Jesus! Your love is so great. You died for me. You came in as salvation to save and redeem me! Even though I was blinded by the world, You still loved me. Thank You for Your eternal love. Oh to be with You and to love You! To enjoy you to the uttermost! I love You Lord Jesus! I will never be separated from You. Amen!

God touches me again. He speaks to me again. After the 3 months perfecting training, I seldom sing to Him or praise the Lord. However, I remember vividly when a brother shared his experience with us, he says: sometimes God attracts us through His words -- hymns. Thank You Lord!
We are God's expression and enlargement so we gotta do what He commissioned us. Give yourself absolutely for the Lord! HE loves us to the uttermost. what a glorious love!!! Amen!
I really love this song^^~ God bless~!

I am touched with this hymn. Amen, Lord! Thank You for loving and making me the same as You are in life and in nature but not in the Godhead. Really, no human mind can ever tell how much You love me. PRAISE THE LORD, for such a Divine romance!!!

This song has truly touched me. It's just so sweet to see how much God loves us and wants us to be like Him in life and nature. His love is so great and surpasses all human knowledge. Lord, keep us loving You more and more each day! I love You, Lord!

What a very wonderful song for all of us. I'm very thankful that God still loves me and forgives me despite of being a sinner and blind. Now as a new saint I finally find my home with God and I love to enjoy Him, for I am forgiven. I really prayed that God may strengthen more my faith in Him and may I continue loving and enjoying Him. To all the brothers and sisters out there, please pray for me after you read my comment. Thank you so much and praise the Lord. Amen.

When I hear this song the Lord touches my heart to love Him so much. I remember the Lord how long was His suffering for us and He died for us.
Now in our new place here in the church in San Pedro I did not expect that I'm here together with new saints but praise the Lord for His arrangement to us whenever we go. He is still there. Thank the Lord! "God fell in love with man." Hallelujah!!!
I just can't seem to get enough of this JESUS. He's the wonderful Lover.

This song blows me away, my spirit is touched! I LOVE YOU JESUS! With a shout of praise! What words can I pen, Lord, that allows me to express to You from the deepest part of my human spirit. I am speechless. Lord You know my heart.
I like this song because it reveals to us the love story of God and man, and even the Lord Jesus and the church.
Thank You Lord for Your love. Lord Jesus, I love You so much. Lord everyday empower us with Your love.
What a loving Christ we have! He fell in love with us!!! Amen, hallelujah!
Amen. Christ is everything to us.
Oh Lord Jesus, I love You very much. This song touches my heart.
I love this song very much! Jesus is always touching my heart! O Lord Jesus! Thank You for loving me....

It's amazing to realize the power of God's love, and realize its ability to bring us, who once rejected Him, to eventually share His life and nature. It's so amazing how even after seeing condition of man's heart, His love is still unchanging for us, and is able to transform us completely. Praise God for His awesome amazing love.
"I'll hold back no longer"........Amen
The love of God is really tender. I love this song because it reminds me that God's intention is to make man same as He is. Amen. May we all reach this desire of the Lord for us through Him
What a very touching song this is! It makes me want to sing it more and more as I think of the Lord Jesus... Oh, how I love Him!

I like this song so much...when I hear it I feel the peace within. It gives me the inspiration to love the Lord more no matter what happen in my church life. THANK THE LORD FOR HIS GREAT MYSTERY...I LOVE YOU LORD...
Praise the Lord! All the Glory and Honor is for our Lord Jesus Christ. OH LORD JESUS !!!

Recovery Version of the Bible, Revelation 22:17, note 1: The entire revelation of the Bible shows us the love story of a universal couple. That is, the sovereign Lord, who created the universe and all things, the Triune God - the Father, the Son, and the Spirit - who went through the processes of incarnation, human living, crucifixion, resurrection, and ascension, and who ultimately became the life-giving Spirit, is joined in marriage to the created, redeemed, regenerated, transformed, and glorified tripartite man - composed of spirit, soul, and body - who ultimately constitutes the church, the expression of God. In the eternity that is without end, by the divine, eternal, and surpassingly glorious life, they will live a life that is the mingling of God and man as one spirit, a life that is superexcellent and that overflows with blessings and joy.
Praise the Lord!

God fell in love with us!
In fact He approved us, appreciated us and POSSESSED us even before the foundation of the world. Not only that He foreknew us, He also predestinated us to be His counterpart in this divine romantic story.
Thank you for your choosing, my Husband. I love you.

Beautiful song, gentle & soft music and heartiest words, happy to have it flown over and over again in my 8-5 work life... It'd stuck in my heart many years ago, have never felt bored listening to it! Listening to hymns is always the easiest and most comfortable way to turn to Him in whatsoever situation.
THIS SONG TOUCH ME MY LIFE BECAUSE THE WORDS ARE WONDERFUL AND MARVELLOUS. GOD AND MAN ARE A GLORIOS DIVINE ROMANCE. I LOVE JESUS! I LOVE THE CHURCH!
this song conspires and constrains me to love the Lord in return more each day...it's like no one could ever love us the way He do... crazy lovers of Jesus this hymn is a no ordinary song!!!
Triune God love us. He give us this song. ILOVEGOD He live in us with this song.He is a life giving Spirit.
Mendengarkan lagu ini, saya kembali diteguhkan untuk mengasihi Tuhan. Sekali lagi lagu ini layak untuk terus dinyanyikan setiap waktu. Tuhan memberkati.

WOW, I Love this song it makes me realize that we should really love the LORD as we experience how tender his love toward us , he died for us , he did everything for us so we must also love him ,praise him as our return .....amen

I really like this hymn..it tells so much about the love between us and the Lord. And indeed it is so sweet to know the Lord fell in love with us=)
And only He can, for we are so unworthy yet He still loves us deeply and truly!! How can we still look unto the things of this world when His love is ever so attractive? Praise the Lord for His greatness and for His everlasting love!!
I just sang this song at a wedding last weekend! It's really is a great song!! :) A song that you're happy to have stuck in your head.
Oh, Lord Jesus I Love You!!! Nothing can separate us from the love of God!!!
it reminds me that there is One who loves me and give Himself up for me. Oh What a love that the Lord Jesus feel to us!To all man! Lord Jesus! We love You!
this song was translated to Vietnamese. this is the great hymn, it make saints crying when they sing. touching our spirit strongly and sweetly. oh, Lord Jesus, thankyou! Amen
Praise the Lord for this song that always touch me when I'm down and become dry in the Church life.it is always remind and give me strength...Lord i love you very much..Amen
Halleluyah! God love us! Just to make us as same as He is in life and nature!
what a beautiful song!

I really love this song. God fell in love with man. He made man the same as He, in life and in nature. Praise the Lord, we are His bride and now we're living together as one couple eternally. Precious hymn to me. Hallelujah!
God fell in love with man for only God's love can. No other love can.. Halleluya! what a love...Lord we love u in return!
This song is really wonderful. The words just touched my heart to love Him evenmore... God bles His Church for His own Expression. Amen!
I enjoy this song very much. It is so wonderful and marvellous that god reaches me. This is a great story that god loves me so much. Lord I love you !
God fell in love with man; who am i but LORD falling in Love..praise the Lord thank you LOrd.. halleluya
Thank you Lord for your Love. Grant us with such love today so that we can love others.
God falled in love with us wow!!!!!!

In winter of 2003, we went to visit a new church in north Philippine just established by FTTM trainees. One night, we joined their homemeeting in a house where Philipine trainees gathered young people in that locality. Those young trainees were teaching young people this song, we were singing with them.
At that very moment, Lord came to me and asked me in an intimate yet strong way, "would you be willing to serve me in a place like this(there is countryside of Philippine)?" I knew that I cannot and was not willing to serve the Lord in a place like that, I am a person who like to pursue better living standard. However, when it came to the fourth stanza," His Love is so tender, to Him, I'll surrende;..., His person's so charming, my heart ever winning; I'll hold back no longer, I'll love Him forever." My heart melt because of His love and experienced that the love of Christ constrain me, I no longer live to myself but to Him who died for us and has been raised. To His asking, i gladly said "yes". I knew I cannot but He can, He is the One who empowers me inwardly not outwardly. This very God fell in love with us and He WILL make us His expression, His bride and His enlargement, forever together living inseperable as one couple eternally. This is OUR DESTINY.
Now I do serve the Lord in a form not as a full-timer but a graduate student, not individually but corporately in priesthood.
Wonderful song.

I was so touched by this line" God fell in love with men". This shows what the relationship is between us and the Lord. He loves us, even the ones used to stand against Him!!! How can I resist such a love from Him? His grace shines, His love declares, and I just want to say: I love the Lord, I am willing to receive Him as my Life!

Praise the Lord for such a bueatiful song that our small group enjoys so much last night. Like brother Howard's song, not only the music but also the wonderful words. I love the Lord because He love me first and more! May we all fall in love with Him forever!
I love this song because it remind me that, one day i have touch me to chasing Him.
God and man! What a glorious divine romance! My Beloved is mine and I am His! A true divine, romantic story.
I like this song because it really tells us how the Lord loves us. The triune God is really in us. And He's the All-inclusive One! Amen.
I realy luv this song. Every time I listen this song refreshes my spirit...
i really like this song because its so nice touching and most of all it reminds me that we are Christ's Bride.so how we need to always call to Him.

We like this song because if remind us that the triune God loves us and want to infuse Himself into us everyday day by day morning by morning hour by hour minute by minute second by second...This song is the most romantic story we've ever heard!!!! Amen.
Saints, let us bring Lord back. By imparting His life in us. Amen.

GOD FELL IN LOVE WITH MAN! BECAUSE ONLY GOD'S LOVE CAN MAKE MAN THE SAME AS HE IN LIFE AND IN NATURE! Oh Lord! We are becoming His bride saints! God fell in Love with man! Now I have fallen in love with God! He LOVES HIS CHURCH SAINTS! LET US BRING HIM BACK!!

I love this song because it details, in a beautiful song, the way the processed Triune God works his way into us slowly and lovingly, until we can do nothing but let go of our old man and scream "OH LORD JESUS, I LOVE YOU!" I came upon this song earlier today, and I can't stop humming the tune. I can't wait to share it in a home meeting!
I really like this song specially when I remember that I will be a bride of Christ, then I love to sing this every season when I pursue Him in my morning revival... AMEN AMEN AMEN!

i like this song if this song play i remember in the trainee. i remember my all batch i so happy. amen i need to transform to god we need counterpart. my email r_catiloc@yahoo.com chat me. amen hallelujah. col.3:16
I really like this song. Not only the melody touch my heart, my spirit is attracted by the lyric also. For His love is constraining, His heart still unchanging, I'll love Him forever.
This song is great!
I really like and love this song. In fact this our wedding song. Everytime I listen to this song refreshes my spirit. This is the story of God and man. How He loved us. Amen.
I like this song. It really impresses me because this is my story when God came to me.

I really like this song because it shows the sweet and intimate relationship between us and our God. O what a wonderful thing that God fell in love with man! He fell in love with us. Praise the Lord. Actually, this hymn was sung on my wedding day. Halleluyah!

When I hear this song I am very glad because God fell in love with man... It is so wonderful! His love can make us, believers of Christ, the same as HE. It is the most important and happy thing for us! Amen!
I love this song....God love us...

This song helps me realize not only the simple facts that the Lord went through for me, but it reveals to me our romantic Christ. Every time I listen, sing it, or play it on guitar, the Lord always touches me with it. Our Christ is such a loving Christ!

This song really touches me when I'm down. Sometimes when I was in the negative situations the song reminds me, and said 'no matter how people look on you whether they like or dislike you, but remember there's one Person who still loves and understands you.'
The greatest mystery on earth, that the religions will never knows. God is love, and thus He has fallen in love with man since men has fallen in the begining unto eternity.
And now I can learn how to love everyone in any kind of situation. This is because He is the One who loves us first, from the beginning to the end.
I love this song! It's so beautiful! While other girls my age (14) are chasing boyfriends & lovers I'm loving my Lord!
The tune is beautiful and words are so true and especially moving. I sang it at wedding recently. The couple loved it and I do as well.
